Class oracle.html.Preformat 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.CompoundItem
                   |
                   +----oracle.html.Preformat
public class Preformat
extends CompoundItem

Description:

Preformat as specified in HTML.

Instructions:

Use Preformat class for text that has been formatted for a monospaced font.

Example: 

// Create a Prefomat object
Preformat pre = new Preformat();
// Add some preformatted text to this object
pre.addItem("         Name: YOUR NAME");
pre.addItem("           ID: YOU ID");

See Also:
